Title: Enacts the student voter empowerment act
Summary: Enacts the "student voter empowerment act"; requires each institution of higher education to designate a staff member to act as a student voting coordinator; requires such coordinator to develop and implement a student voting action plan to increase student voter registration and voting and democratic participation among students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to enacting the "student voter empowerment act"
